text: Sir James Fitz-Allen Mitchell (15 May 1931 - 23 November 2021) was the former Prime Minister of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines. He was the second Prime Minister of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines and the founder of the New Democratic Party (NDP). He also was Premier of the then colony of Saint Vincent from 1972 to 1974, and as Prime Minister of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines from 1984 to 2000. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Prime Ministers of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines Category:Diplomats Category:Knights Commander of the Order of St Michael and St George
title: James Fitz-Allen Mitchell
